Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: As the Australian Federal Budget looms closer people have taken to social media to voice their budgetary concerns. There's disappointment from some over the lack of action to increase the JobSeeker payment in the upcoming budget while others demand the scrapping of stage 3 tax cuts. Some are concerned with the spiralling costs of aged care services and are demanding additional welfare assistance. Meanwhile others are urging the inclusion of funds dedicated to helping the homeless and improving health care coverage. Calls for change and urges to make a difference run rampant in the social sphere increasing intensity as the budget approaches.
